contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 29, 1904 D Scotland vs. Durham and Northumberland Associations Contest (First Section)
Scotland vs. Durham and Northumberland Associations Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Scotland vs. Durham and Northumberland Associations Contest scotland-vs-durham-and-northumberland-as-5374
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Waverley Market, Edinburgh 1st section contest
8 bands competed - 4 chosen from the Scottish Amateur Band Association, and 4 from the Durham and Northumberland Assocation.
Sept. 5, 2013, 4:09 p.m. June 16, 2014, 9:19 a.m.
1 Polton Mills William Rimmer Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
2 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Friend Farrand Die Meistersinger
3 Broxburn Public Band William Rimmer Memories of Mendelssohn
4 Heworth Colliery Band Wilfred Turnbull Beethoven's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
5 Consett Ironworks William Holdsworth Poliuto [unknown arranger]
5 Spencer's Steelworks Prize Band Robert Rimmer Mendelssohn [arr. Round]
7 Larkhall Public J. W. A. Eskdale Mendelssohn [arr. Round]
8 Cockerton Prize Silver Band William Watson Die Meistersinger
